snippet: Stocks closed slightly higher, just enough to post new nominal highs for the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index.
abstract: Stocks rally in last minutes of flat trading day, closing with slight gains to set new nominal high for Dow Jones industrial average and S&P 500; gains may be sign that investors believe year's rally is not yet quite over.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed slightly higher, just enough to post new nominal highs for the Dow Jones industrial average and the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index.

headline.main: Shares Creep Upward Despite Mixed Economic News
headline.print_headline: Shares Creep Upward Despite Mixed Economic News
